page.title: 14Modern Housing
page.content: In the last 20 years Balsall Common village has changed from a small agricultural community to having several large estates. The people living on these estates have occupations like busines executives and they commute to cities like Birmingham or Coventry. A typical example of such an estate is { Lark Rise.}It surrounds Balsall Common Primary School and is near to the Heart of England Comprehensive School. On the Lark Rise Estate there are hundreds of large detached houses, many with 4 bedrooms and 2 garages. Some of the houses are close together with fairly small gardens. Where the Lark Rise Estate stands now, there was once only fields. It is hard to imagine that a cow could have once stood where your living room is now!
